hero.title: Tailored to deliver the best for your business
hero.desc: By applying behavioral science to user  experience, we design engaging digital products that people love to use. Keep in mind, users come for the features but they stay for the comfort your product offers to them. The product can give them what they need but if it is not easy to use, they will left your product. This is our purpose, make your great product easy to use, useful, beautiful, simple, enjoyable for your user.

about.title: From your dreams to reality.
about.desc1: Killing Giants is a user experience design agency with a mission to provide meaning fuluser-centred experiences that solve problems through beautiful design, intuitive interfacesand technical innovation.
about.desc2: Our approach is based on improving the relationship between people, processes and technology through immersive discovery workshops, brand strategy, UX/UI design, user research and testing, front-end, mobile and app development.

1.title: Before action, reflection.
1.name: UX Design.
1.desc: In order to meet the needs of your users, our team of designers, thanks to a methodology based on co-design, develops for you a strategy based on design thinking. This methodology allows us to define the problem, to make brainstorming sessions to answer it, then once the solution is found, to create a prototype of the envisaged solution to visualize it in order to test it.

2.title: Beautiful interfaces.
2.name: UI Design.
2.desc: Once the wireframes have been laid out and validated, our interface designers come into play to give the application or software its final appearance.They must then design and/or use the appropriate icons and the right colors so that the whole is not only harmonious but also triggers in the end user a pleasure related to the use of the digital product.

3.title: The truth is elsewhere.
3.name: Coding.
3.desc: An interface can be pretty and intuitive but if there are no codes behind it, it is useless. This is where the artists of our agency come in. Through beautifully written code, they make the application or software work. Using the design of the interface designers, they put in place the necessary magic so that the application not only works but also has no bugs whatever the display.

team.title: Award winning UX team.
team.desc1: We are small , distributed team. With our headquarters located in Lomé, Togo. Our team has come together through the passion of solving complicated problems, through design and development.
team.desc2: We work closely with our clients and their customers to truly understand the values (et les attentes) of all parties. We help business bridge this connection and enhance customer experience.

contact.title: Let’s work together…
contact.desc: and create experiences that engage your audience & elevate your brand. We will team up with your business and together we will overcome your current challenge and take your business into the next level. As a full-service design agency we work closely with our clients to define, design and develop transformative user experiences across all platforms and in order to do that, we pay special attention to how your product looks and feels.

p1.title: You are never better served than by yourself.
p1.desc: Because why not we chose to put our website in our portfolio. After all, it is the showcase of our design and code know-how. We wanted something simple, elegant, fast and pleasant to browse. We had in mind during the development a minimalist website that would deliver just the information the client needs to judge if they should work with us or not.

p2.title: Winner of the no-code hackathon 2021 of Brydg.
p2.desc: Last November, for a week, we participated in a no code hackathon organized by the association Brydge from which we came out as winners. The objective was to make the UX and UI of a fair tourism application. Our application made it possible to discover the Bassar country and its activities by using many tools such as the Tourpedia (a kind of wikipedia in Siri mode) as well as the augmented reality to know the history of the region and the whole while allowing the region to receive a share on each tourist. The challenge is to make the application intuitive and easy to use Translated with www.DeepL.com/Translator (free version).

p3.title: kaba delivery redesign.
p3.desc: Kaba Delivery is a ready-to-eat delivery service launched by Kaba and based in Lomé, Togo. Orders are taken via the mobile application from partner restaurants and are delivered by independent motorcycle couriers. We have here a proposal of what could be their site to be even more professional and in the air of time.

p4.title: Projet Mihawk: Gestion d'etablissement.
p4.desc: The Mihawk project was commissioned by a private school in Gabon. It is a report card management software that allows any owner of this software to generate the report cards of his entire school. It is configured with several basic modules: registration, management of classes and subjects and recording of grades. Developed in Python, this software is simple and easy to use thanks to an interface studied to be both simple and user-friendly thanks to our ux and ui designers Translated with www.DeepL.com/Translator (free version).
